"The proof was legally sufficient to support a conviction in each instance but the juries simply did not credit the witnesses, voting 10-2 and 11-1 for acquittal."
"If another trial takes place there is every reason to believe the jury will again be divided or will acquit."

"Here is a man in jail now more than seven months primarily because of an offense which the Government is unable to convince a jury he committed. ... To permit a retrial, after 21 of 24 jurors have already refused to convict, is to ignore the reasonable doubt standard."
